getFavorites

public RoomDeviceList getFavorites(long updatePeriod)
Reads all saved favorite devices. The result will be provided to the given listener.

Parameters:
updatePeriod - -1 if the underlying list should always be updated, otherwise do update if the last update is longer ago than the given period
Returns:
favorite RoomDeviceList
